attributes.title: Burtons Snowboards Product Manufacturing
attributes.description: This is a map of where all of the parts of Burton's snowboards are manufactured and assembled.
The  United States Delaware Glue Company located in Delaware, USA produces the glue that is put under the fiber glass for the Burton snowboards.
attributes.title: United States Delaware Glue Company

attributes.description:
A factory located in Salzburg, Austria creates the screen print as well as are sent all the products and pieces of the snowboard from the United States and China and are assembled in the Austrian Factory. 
There are no more Burton snowboards produced in the United States except a few prototypes.
attributes.title: A factory in Salzburg, Austria

attributes.description: Austria ISOSPORTS, Co creates the poly ethylene P/TEX (base of the board) on the snowboards.
attributes.title: Austria ISOSPORTS, Co

attributes.description: China Paint Mfg Company manufactures paint which goes on the screens of the snowboard.
attributes.title: China Paint Mfg Company

attributes.description: KUAO LENG SCREW CO.,LTD manufactures screws and bolts for the bindings for Burton.
attributes.title: KUAO LENG SCREW CO.,LTD

attributes.description: Zhejiang Yongkang Weier Imp. & Exp. Co., Ltd. is located in Zhejiang, manufactures rubber stoppers for Burton. (These rubber stoppers go into the channel well of the snowboard).
attributes.title: Zhejiang Yongkang Weier Imp. & Exp. Co., Ltd.

attributes.description: The United States Steel Corporation whose headquarters are located in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA produces the steel on the edge of Burton snowboards.
attributes.title: United States Steel Corporation (USS)

attributes.description: Nakamura Lacquer company which is located in Japan produces the lacquer for the Burton snowboards.
attributes.title: Nakamura Lacquer Company

attributes.description: Zhejiang Yongkang Weier Imp. & Exp. Co., Ltd. which is located in Zhejiang, China which produces the fiberglass in a Burton snowboard.
attributes.title: Zhejiang Yongkang Weier Imp. & Exp. Co., Ltd.

attributes.description: A factory located in the United States of America which produces the carbon fiber which is what you put on top of the base wood piece in a Burton snowboard.
attributes.title: A factory in the United States of America

attributes.description: A factory located in the United States of America produces the metal inserts in Burton snowboards.
attributes.title: A factory in the United States of America

attributes.description: The core of the snowboard, which is the wood piece of the board is milled and constructed here in Vermont
attributes.title: Burton Snowboards (Original) Factory Store
